question: Analyze the social media engagement of companies in the technology industry and identify trends over the past year.

subtasks.task: Retrieve a list of companies in the technology industry along with their social media details such as engagement counts.
Aggregate the social media engagement metrics (likes, comments, shares) for each technology company to identify the most engaged companies.
Analyze the aggregated data to identify trends in social media engagement (e.g., which platforms are gaining more traction) over the past year.
